version-log.language: 1. The intelligent diagnostic function of MAX has been added. 2. MIX and SPF5000 have been optimized. 3. The registration process of foreign countries has been optimized. 4. Many other functional modules have been optimized.

1. The intelligent diagnostic function of MAX has been added. 2. MIX and SPF5000 have been optimized. 3. The registration process of foreign countries has been optimized. 4. Many other functional modules have been optimized.
1、添加了MAX智能诊断功能； 2、优化了MIX、SPF5000； 3、优化了国外的注册流程； 4、优化了其他多个功能模块
